text:
<optional title, max 6 words>

<setup: Jesus, Martha, grief, tension>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Martha: “If You had been here...”

---

<setup: Jesus, Martha, sorrowful crowd>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Jesus: “Where have you laid him?”

Martha: “Lord, come and see.”  
Jesus: “...He wept.”  

---

<setup: Raskolnikov, Martha, emotional turmoil>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Raskolnikov: “She’s trembling with fever.”  

Martha: “Could not this Man have saved him?”  
Raskolnikov: “Triumph and joy... it’s coming!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov observes a woman's emotional turmoil as she passionately engages with the story of Jesus, reflecting themes of belief and doubt.
